``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Subscapular fossa of [scapula]({{< var ref-scapula-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Lesser tubercle of [Humerus]({{< var ref-humerus-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} - [Upper Subscapular N.]({{< var ref-upper-subscapular-nerve.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - [Lower Subscapular N.]({{< var ref-lower-subscapular-nerve.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - ([C5]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c5 >}}), [C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} **GHJ**: Internal Rotation, Adduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Test - Lift-off Test (Gerber's test) - Bear hug test - Belly press test (Napolean Test) - "performed by having the patient place the affected hand on the abdomen and attempt to move the elbow anteriorly. The test was considered positive if the patient could not move the elbow forward" @gillPhysicalExaminationPartial2007
